mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPassword, boardContents, fileAttached, memberId) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPassword}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached}, #{memberId})
insert into board_file (originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boarTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, date_format(boardCreated, %Y-%m-%d) as boardCreated from board order by id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
